5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Umm Salamah that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to pray two short Rak’ah after Witr, sitting down

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ بَعْدَ الْوِتْرِ جَالِسًا
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the two Rak’ah sitting down after Witr
